Honeywell Customer Connect
Dear Honeywell Customer:
Happy New Year! I want to lead off by thanking you for doing business with Honeywell and restating my commitment to helping your business succeed. Our team of professionals is here to deliver the best customer and technical service to you and your organization every day. And with our expanded events and operator conference calendar included below, we will be going to more places to talk face to face with our operators about their Honeywell products and services. I am always available so don’t hesitate to contact me for further assistance. -- David Did You Know?
Dassault and Honeywell offer a new way to provide in-flight communications to Falcon operators
Dassault Aviation launched FalconConnect, a comprehensive solution designed to facilitate the use, management and control of in-flight connectivity. Powered by Honeywell’s GoDirect services, FalconConnect is designed to make connectivity as efficient and straightforward as possible for operators, crews and passengers alike... Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2018/june/dassault-and-honeywell-offer-a-new-way-to-provide-inflight-cabin-and-cockpit-communications-to-falcon-operators]]>.
Field Service Engineer Ed Leadley thinks like the customer to drive superior service
Ed Leadley knows exactly what it’s like to work in a busy corporate flight department -- he spent close to two decades as an aircraft mechanic and director of maintenance... Easy Access to Technical Support and on-demand webinars We’re always trying to simplify your access to technical support. In addition to a new streamlined contact-us form <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/support/technical-support]]> on MyAerospace Portal, you can also search for webinars and videos <[[https://honeywellaerocommunities.force.com/SSCommunity/TSSCommunityCases]]> in the portal. Review previous and upcoming webinars here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/technical-support-webinars]]>. If you need additional customer support, I am your point of contact.
